user_query: I want to explore different investment opportunities. Can you assist me in gathering ownership data, company profiles, and annual distributions for a diverse range of stocks? Please include the performance IDs 0P0000OQN8 and F00000O2CG. Additionally, provide me with the 24-hour trading data for a variety of tickers.

TaskList.description: Gather ownership data for stocks with performance IDs 0P0000OQN8 and F00000O2CG.
Fetch company profiles for the stocks identified in subtask 1.
Obtain annual distributions for the stocks identified in subtask 1.
Collect 24-hour trading data for a variety of stock tickers.
